item.title: Special English Test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the Winter Session
item.description: The SLAM Centre is running a special English test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the autumn session. The test is being held in person at the SLAM Centre, 11, Santa Sofia street ‚Äì Milan - on the following day:%0A‚Ä¢ 24th January 2024 at 10.00 a.m.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
